item.title: Accelerate Marketing
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Accelerate Marketing had a fully functioning WordPress site that they needed upgraded and customized. Using the provided PSDs, I was able to create custom page templates, replicate the desired designs, and create custom 404, contact,[...]
item.content:encoded: Accelerate Marketing had a fully functioning WordPress site that they needed upgraded and customized. Using the provided PSDs, I was able to create custom page templates, replicate the desired designs, and create custom 404, contact, and services pages. I also installed and customized plugins to add functionality and appeal to the site.

item.title: Wellness Program Collateral
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Veda Salon & Spa implemented a Wellness Program for their services and needed a flyer and mirror talker to promote the program. Using Photoshop and their existing brand guidelines I was able to create a[...]
item.content:encoded: Veda Salon & Spa implemented a Wellness Program for their services and needed a flyer and mirror talker to promote the program. Using Photoshop and their existing brand guidelines I was able to create a clean, concise, and eye-catching flyer. This collateral has brought a lot of attention and new members to the program.

item.title: Jubilee Austen
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Jubilee Austen provided a Photoshop mockup that she desired to be turned in to a clean and simple portfolio website. I replicated this website from scratch using the provided PSD. The website was designed using[...]
item.content:encoded: Jubilee Austen provided a Photoshop mockup that she desired to be turned in to a clean and simple portfolio website. I replicated this website from scratch using the provided PSD. The website was designed using HTML & CSS best practices.

item.title: The Whole Bean Branding
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: The Whole Bean is a neighborhood coffee shop that needed help with branding and launching a website. I built The Whole Beans brand from the ground up including the development of brand psychology, user themes,[...]
item.content:encoded: The Whole Bean is a neighborhood coffee shop that needed help with branding and launching a website. I built The Whole Beans brand from the ground up including the development of brand psychology, user themes, color theory, typography, social media headers, and custom icons and logos. I also provided them a PSD for their launch day landing page, which included a CTA form.

item.title: Rogue Pickings
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Rogue Pickings is a farm-to-table fresh food truck. I created a single page website from a provided PSD using HTML & CSS best practices.
item.content:encoded: Rogue Pickings is a farm-to-table fresh food truck. I created a single page website from a provided PSD using HTML & CSS best practices.

item.title: Election Map
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: I built this interactive Election Map using an HTML map and custom CSS. Hovering over individual states triggers the results of that state and fills in the desired field with a vote count and announces[...]
item.content:encoded: I built this interactive Election Map using an HTML map and custom CSS. Hovering over individual states triggers the results of that state and fills in the desired field with a vote count and announces the winner of the state.

item.title: Unplugged Music Magazine
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Unplugged Music Magazine understands the importance of having a website that is built mobile-first as much of their users engage with their site on mobile devices. Taking an existing website, I was able to convert[...]
item.content:encoded: Unplugged Music Magazine understands the importance of having a website that is built mobile-first as much of their users engage with their site on mobile devices. Taking an existing website, I was able to convert the site into a visually pleasing and functional mobile site using HTML & CSS best practices.
